title: Type for calendar
content:
Hey i ws just working on the layout and design for a calendar. Please comment.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [January Janus Concept.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426172655/http:/typophile.com/files/January%20Janus%20Concept.jpg) | 609.94 KB |
author: Sanchit Sawaria

comments.content:
I'm not sure if I get it: Is the monthly calender going to change while the 2009 and 2011 will be visible every month? That would be boring.  
The spacing of the numbers IMHO is too tight (except in 2011 :-).  
And Eurostile looks much like the 1970s, not 2010.

No this layout is only for the month of january........its inspired from the paegan god janus as he looks at both the past and the future....ill work on the spacing again.....wt other type could i use instead of eurostile...??
It looks like eurostile but its actually WAUKEGAN
